Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Fix private data tutorial instructions for base64
Issue.description: {code} Reason is because base64 command on linux adds a problematic newline character to wrap after every 76 characters. To fix this you can use {code:java} -w 0{code} to eliminate the wrapping. However -w option is not available in Alpine, therefore we will manually remove any existing newline characters, this will work across all platforms: {code:java} export MARBLE=$(echo -n "{\"name\":\"marble1\",\"color\":\"blue\",\"size\":35,\"owner\":\"tom\",\"price\":99}" | base64 | tr -d \\n){code} Thanks to tip at: https://superuser.com/a/1225334 >
